name: Godot Engine
description: Godot Engine is a feature-packed, cross-platform game engine to create 2D and 3D games from a unified interface. It provides a comprehensive set of common tools, so that you can focus on making games without having to reinvent the wheel.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Graphics: Drivers with support for OpenGL 3.3

reviews.review_text: Godot Engine is a powerful game engine with a build in editor. Adding new gameplay features is fast and quite straightforward thanks to the Node structure. The python-like scritping language is very easy to learn for people who know programming. I definitely recommend it.

I've using Godot for months, for prototyping or finish the game, it's definitely the great tool to use.  However, the user interface need time to get used to, and the interface was actually changed much since 1.1, if you're a new user, you're lucky as the current interface is more user friendly.  This Engine should be in your Steam database, as one day you suddenly want to make a game, this is a completely free and powerful tool worth a try.

we worked with too many engines, we released games with other game engines, but this is the best engine that I'v encounterd we are using this engine for over a year , now it is available in steam.   why it is the best first of all it's easy to use it's just 25 mb the whole engine the data that you download here is with sample projects but the real engine is 25 mb . it has a dedicated script language it is so easy that one of my friends that does not anything about programming making games with this engine after just 2 weeks.  when you open a game engine for example U* you get so many buttons menus and you wonder wow how can I work with this engine, but godot make it easy for you and support most of things that they have. or when you work with some engine that does not have any coding , you encounter some cases that you don't know how to overcome but here in godot you can do whatever you want,  someimes there is bug in a game engine and the bug will be there for along time , but here in godot you can solve your problems or better just make an issue in github or irc channel and the community solve the problem for you.  so in summary you have a flexible , easy to learn , open source , completely free and great game enigne just download it today and make your awesome game and share it here in steam that will be great.  by the way you know what is awesome the editor is written with godot too, everything that editor can do you can do it in your game.
worth trying free opensource fast  efficient Totally recommended

I have only really started learning Godot and have fallen in love with it in the first few hours. To say it's easy to use would do the software an inustice, but it is intuitive and easy to get to grips with on a basic level. It's nodes utility runs as if you are using Unreal or Unity, and there is roo for coding, as long as you can utilize python, which to all intents and purposes is a simple language to get used to. If you want drag and drop with minumnm coding, yeah it can do that but don't expect the best game ever without a little effort. It ranks as a very powerful tool, and really pushed my descion making into upgrading fro RPGMaker MV to Gamemaker. Godot Engine won me over, and best of all, it was free to purchase. With a little more work and learning I pray I can make the best adventure for you in my upcoming game in progress, Subworld.
